register.title: Create Account
register.newsletter: I wish to be contacted by Tumi UAE by email to receive newsletters, personalized information products and services, invitations to events and marketing surveys in relation with Fashion & Accessories.
register.privacypolicy: By clicking on “Create my account” you confirm you have read the privacy policy and consent to the processing of your personal data by Tumi for the management of your account, and Tumi client relationship in the conditions set forth in the Privacy policies available in the footer. If you tick the appropriate boxe(s), you also consent to the processing of your personal data by Tumi for direct marketing, which may be tailored based on the personal data we know about you and your preferences. In order to provide you with the same personalized service worldwide, your personal data may be communicated to  Tumi International.
register.privacypolicy2: As per applicable laws and regulations, you are entitled to access, correct and delete any data that may relate to you. You may also ask us not to send you personalized communications on our products and services. You may exercise these right at any time contacting us as set forth in the relevant Privacy policy.
register.dob_info: Day Month Year ( dd - mm - yyyy )

input_errors.email: Please enter a valid email address

onboarding.product_description: This area is used to describe your product’s details. Tell customers about the look, feel, and style of your product. Add details on color, materials used, sizing, and where it was made.
onboarding.blog_excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.
onboarding.no_content: This section doesn’t currently include any content. Add content to this section using the sidebar.

shipping.shipping_method_title: *Express Delivery: DUBAI orders placed before 2PM will be shipped same day - ABU DHABI/SHARJAH orders placed before 12PM will be shipped same day. All orders coming after cut off time, will be prioritized for the next day.
